body:
Comment 2 by **fibercut**: 
It's a pretty bold statement that it's impossible to implement a protocol so simple as
JSON-RPC fully according to the protocol specifications. It may take some of the beauty
out of the implementation, however since protocols are there to establish communication
between systems, it's probably a bad idea to implement go's own dialect simply because
of deficiencies in the language or the implementation of it's standard libraries.
